## ğŸ“‹ Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have removed any console.log or debug statements

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this change manually

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the API documentation (Swagger/OpenAPI) if needed
- [ ] I have added/updated relevant comments in the code

### Security
- [ ] My code doesn't introduce any security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have checked for SQL injection vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have checked for XSS vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have validated all user inputs

### Database
- [ ] I have created/updated migrations if needed
- [ ] I have added appropriate indexes for new queries
- [ ] I have tested migrations both up and down
